title: UK Conservative lawmaker Duncan Smith says time to get Brexit done
text:
FILE PHOTO: Ian Duncan Smith is seen outside the venue for the Conservative Party annual conference in Manchester, Britain October 1, 2019. REUTERS/Henry Nicholls

LONDON (Reuters) - Conservative lawmaker Iain Duncan Smith said he would be voting in favor of British Prime Minister Boris Johnson’s European Union divorce deal on Saturday saying it was time to get Brexit done.

“I had my concerns and my doubts. But I think, on balance, the key thing is we’ve just got to get this done,” Duncan Smith, a hardline Brexit supporter, told BBC radio.
description: Conservative lawmaker Iain Duncan Smith said he would be voting in favor of British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's European Union divorce deal on Saturday saying it was time to get Brexit done.
